1.title: Black Panther
1.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

2.title: Thor: Ragnarok
2.description: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnar√∂k, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

3.title: Captain Marvel
3.description: Captain Marvel gets caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

4.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
4.description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe. The soundtrack is also fantastic.
